name: Atlassian
description: Manage Confluence pages and Jira issues in Atlassian products

env.name: Confluence Instance URL
env.description: Base URL for your Confluence instance (Cloud or Server/DC). Example: https://your-company.atlassian.net/wiki or https://confluence.your-company.com

env.name: Confluence Username (Cloud)
env.description: Email/username for Confluence Cloud login. Ignored for Server/DC.

env.name: Confluence API Token (Cloud)
env.description: API token for Confluence Cloud authentication. Generate at Atlassian security settings.

env.name: Jira Instance URL
env.description: Base URL for your Jira instance (Cloud or Server/DC). Example: https://your-company.atlassian.net or https://jira.your-company.com

env.name: Jira Username (Cloud)
env.description: Email/username for Jira Cloud login. Ignored for Server/DC.

env.name: Jira API Token (Cloud)
env.description: API token for Jira Cloud authentication. Generate at Atlassian security settings.

env.name: Read-Only Mode
env.description: Set to 'true' to disable all write operations.

env.name: Enabled Tools
env.description: Comma-separated list of enabled tool names (e.g., confluence_search,jira_get_issue).
